name: Leak or Die!
description:
Leak or Die is a local multiplayer coop game for two players on the most classic retro console of all time! Two players need to work together to survive an endless onslaught of birdy monsters. Only by leaking the contents of crates through an unpack-portal they are able to obtain the tools and weapons that will give 'em a chance.

Super Create Box meets NES splitscreen


Get the box!

Align the Portals!

Shoot the birds!

Be Radical!!!


a classic game by the NES guys

Paul Nasdalack @littlebughunter
Thomas Frandsen
Julian Oberbeck @fleity

(thx to Nickolae Berbece for invaluable feedback & advice)



Instructions:

  1. download the zip file from itch, unpack the .nes rom
  2. download a NES emulator or flash the rom to a cartridge
  3. start emulator or put cartridge into console and turn on
  4. press start and have fun
